Phrase.Text: What we were unable to accomplish covertly, we will accomplish through our combined strength. You've only managed to make us angrier.
We will fight you to until the bitter end, [YourLeaderName]. Revenge for your past atrocities will be swift and absolute.
Our friends have gathered. Prepare to watch your army fall.
Let us seek out and purge the weak nations from our galaxy. Existence is a privilege that these creatures have failed to earn.
